title: Randomly Disconnecting from League Games
body:
So, I recently played a Yasuo game in ranked, and i was doing fine, i got first blood on an Ori, and I was 2-0. Then for some reason, I just randomly disconnected, to follow that, I had to restart my computer to actually quit league. Then I had to restart it again, because league made it crash when I tried to reopen it. I finally got back, and about 3 minutes later, I disconnected again. It wasn't my internet because I was playing music for the majority of the time my PC was running. The first time i crashed my music was running while i was stuck trying to leave. I'm not sure what to do about this, it doesn't happen all the time, but when it does, it really sucks. Is there any settings I can mess with or anything to fix it?
Thanks.

replies.body: This sounds like a yucky series of events, and I'd like to help!  Your issue seems to be network related specifically staying connected to our game servers.  I recommend starting with each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to both tune up your connection and make sure that it's configured to communicate smooth with the servers.  Hopefully that will do the trick!
